O1.summary: Grant SubLight Remote Access to the Station

description.S1: The override cartridge will hand over control of the station's systems to SubLight,
description.S2: legitimizing Lilya's claim over the salvage.

blurb.B1: Travel to HRS-1084 station and restore the power.
blurb.B2: You can pick up UDL Identity Cartridge from a chair in the mess hall.
blurb.B3: Use the terminal past the mines and set the generator to normal.
blurb.B4: You will be contacted by ADA shortly after, and you will learn that the UDL has docked with the station and intend to wipe you out.
blurb.B5: The Corporate Commander will contact you and you can Persuade (55) her to not attack you if you have gained Adjutant Akande's trust by completing The Demolished Woman quest.
blurb.B6: You can also Bribe her with 2550 Bits or Intimidate (65) her to into not making an enemy of SubLight.
blurb.B7: You can also Lie (65) that you will press the self destruct button.
blurb.B8: If you used the UDL Identity Cartridge you'll be asked about the automechanicals.
blurb.B9: Lie or Intimidate (35) to deal with it.
blurb.B10: Any of these will get them to undock from the station without conflict.
blurb.B11: exit the main room on the right hand side from where you first came in.
blurb.B12: There will also be mines down these stairs.
blurb.B13: There is a locked door that requires Lockpicking (40) or you can use the Electrical Control Room Keycard.
blurb.B14: Inside is a terminal you can use to disengage security protocol.
blurb.B15: use the terminal in the office.
blurb.B16: Read the logs to find out about the experiments being done here,
blurb.B17: and get some alarm bells as you discover the executive override password for UDL communications is the same one that you used to get into the lab in Cascadia in Monarch.
blurb.B18: When you're done reading, insert the SubLight Override Cartridge.

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: Captain, I've been attempting to contact you with urgent news. However, communicational functionality was impaired due to the power outage.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What's going on, ADA?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm a little busy. Can this wait?

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: A UDL vessel has been tracking our position and just recently docked with the station. They are patching into the station's transmission lines now. I cannot stop-

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: [Static]

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've been waiting for this day since we tagged your ship in Cascadia, Captain. So glad we finally have this opportunity. My ship is docked with Ten Eighty-Four. There's no escape.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you want?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I think you've got the wrong guy.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Cut the transmission.>

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: You've been poking your nose into restricted locations. This makes my superiors unhappy. I could peel your ship open like a can of boarst, but I'm in a sporting mood.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Would a cut of the profits change your mind? Say... <oeiglobal>Bribe_Amount</oeiglobal> bits?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're about to make an enemy of SubLight. Trust me, you don't want that.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What was that? You want me to hit this big "self-destruct" button?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You won't take me alive.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: An adequate sum. They must pay you smugglers better than I thought.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's all commission, but the benefits are pretty good.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You should consider a new line of work.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Really? Hm. Call me intrigued.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Let's act as if we never saw each other. Try and keep it that way, Captain.

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: [Static]

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: The UDL gunship remains docked at the station. They must intend to board with a full squad of troops.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Can I do that? Why, I wouldn't even know where to begin...

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: SubLight? Ugh. I hate it when you outlaws organize. The paperwork for killing you would be the death of me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Sorry. Better luck next time.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Now I feel bad. Want to fight me anyway, off the record?

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Don't apologize. This is my problem, not yours.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Squad, I'm ordering a recall. There's a... misspelling on our orders that ought to be corrected. On the double.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: That's kind of you to ask, but we have a tight schedule. It's open season on trespassers.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: I didn't say that. How did you gain access to that system? Stop it at once!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Hit a random key.> Welcome to Hell, Commander.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Just kidding. Or am I? Want to find out the hard way?

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Nooo!

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: Did you... did you hit it yet? What's happening in there?

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: I don't know who you are, but I have nothing to gain by risking my hide against a lunatic. Commander out.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: I assure you that was never my intention. See you soon, Captain.

dialog.speaker: 1002_UDL_Commander (Female)
dialog.utterance: I think not. The refueling system at Cascadia's landing pad logged your ship ID.

dialog.speaker: PlayerShipAI (Female)
dialog.utterance: Unfortunately, it cannot.
